mdq:check.name: Resource Publisher Identifier Present
mdq:check.description: Check that a resource publisher identifier exists.
mdq:check.code:
def call(): global output global status global datasetPublisherIdentifier
import metadig.variable as mvar
# A resource publisher identifier is not present if 'datasetPublisherIdentifier' not in globals() or datasetPublisherIdentifier is None: output = "No resource publisher identifier was found." status = "FAILURE" return False
# Convert all values to unicode datasetPublisherIdentifier = mvar.toUnicode(datasetPublisherIdentifier)
if (mvar.isBlank(datasetPublisherIdentifier)): output = "The resource publisher identifier is blank." status = "FAILURE" return False else: # Check if resource publisher identifier is a single string or arrayList if(isinstance(datasetPublisherIdentifier, str)): output = "The resource publisher identifier '{}' was found.".format(datasetPublisherIdentifier.strip()) elif (isinstance(datasetPublisherIdentifier, list)): output = "The resource publisher identifier '{}' was found (first of {} publisher identifiers).".format(datasetPublisherIdentifier[0].strip(), len(datasetPublisherIdentifier))
status = "SUCCESS" return True
